ComicInfo.Summary:
Glamourpuss takes her annual rehab a little early this year, leaving Dave Slim to fill in with 'Classic Corvettes in Crisis,' a 10-page 'Where Are They Now?' feature on America's first sports car. The 'Comics in Photorealism' section examines Stan Drake's 'EvenJones, Actress' sequence from 1966-67. Cover by Russ Heath, including a biographical feature: 'Russ Heath: The Closest I Ever Came to Getting Married a Second Time.'
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/glamourpuss-11/4000-194384/
